tool_description: The Japanese alphabet API is used to retrieve characters from the Japanese writing systems, including hiragana and katakana.

api_list.name: Get Language Characters
api_list.description: This API endpoint retrieves characters from the specified Japanese writing system. Options include all characters from hiragana, katakana, and their combinations, as well as specific sets like base hiragana or katakana.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: Specifies the type of characters to retrieve.
